title: Dave Matthews Band has four more stops on their 2025 tour. Here's where to find tickets.
description: Dave Matthews Band has a few more shows in their 2025 tour, but tickets are limited. Tickets start at $57.
content: If you're hoping to see the iconic Dave Matthews Band live, it's not too late to see them in 2025. The group has a few more dates remaining in their tour this year, though seats are harder to find as the dates get closer. With that in mind, I've gathered all the ways to get Dave Matthews Band tickets below.2024 saw the Dave Matthews Band inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, with a ceremony held in Cleveland on October 19 of the same year. The 2025 summer tour brought the band back to Richmond, Virginia, for the first time in 30 years, and soon, will return them to Inglewood’s historic Kia Forum for their first show at the venue since 1998. The tour will conclude with a stop in George, Washington, for their traditional Labor Day weekend residency at the Gorge Amphitheatre for three back-to-back days of performances.If you’re looking to grab tickets to Dave Matthews Band’s 2025 tour or music festival stops, we’ve got you covered. Here’s our breakdown of Dave Matthews Band's tour schedule, purchasing details, and price comparisons between resale and original tickets. You can also browse concert and ticket specifics on StubHub and Vivid Seats at your convenience.Dave Matthews Band began their 2025 tour following a stop at the New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival. The tour took them across North America through the summer, and they'll finish off with their annual tradition, a three-day stop in George, Washington, for Labor Day weekend.You can buy original tickets for Dave Matthews Band’s 2025 performances on Ticketmaster. Original tickets are selling quickly, and as of writing, several locations have already sold out all their original tickets, including Houston, Columbia, Toronto, Richmond, Gilford, Big Sky, and Stateline performances.Tickets are also available for purchase from verified resale vendors such as StubHub and Vivid Seats. Given the high demand for original tickets and their limited availability, specifically for sold-out shows, you may find more options from these sites in terms of price, availability, and seating choice.Ticket prices for Dave Matthews Band’s 2025 tour stops vary depending on the date, location, and demand for each show. Original tickets on Ticketmaster for general admission lawn standing areas average around $66, with seating options ranging from $100 to $700. Please check the performance date and location you are interested in for the most up to date information on original tickets as the number remaining is extremely limited.On StubHub, the lowest cost tickets to Dave Matthews Band’s 2025 tour stops range from $23 for their July 8 performance in Toronto to $172 for their July 15 show in Richmond, Virginia. Vivid Seats offers similar pricing, ranging from $26 to $168 for the same two stops. Important to note is that this range does not include Dave Matthews Band’s festival performances, nor their back-to-back show ticket sets, which are generally priced higher. Overall, while original and resale ticket prices have a noticeable range depending on the seat location and date, resale currently appears to have more affordable options.There are currently no VIP packages being offered on Ticketmaster for Dave Matthews Band's 2025 tour stops.Several performers, including Goose, Béla Fleck & The Flecktones, KALEO, Southern Avenue, Oskar & Julia, and The Late Show with Stephen Colbert bandleader Louis Cato, are confirmed to support Dave Matthews Band for their three-day tour closer in George, Washington, on Labor Day weekend. It has not been announced if there will be opening or supporting acts for their other tour stops; however, it is likely that there may be.Outside of their performance in Toronto on July 8, the Dave Matthews Band has no international performances scheduled for 2025.
summary: The iconic Dave Matthews Band band has four dates remaining on their 2025 tour, but seats are becoming increasingly difficult to find due to increased demand. Tickets for the summer tour will include a stop in Richmond, Virginia, and Inglewood’s historic Kia Forum for their first show since 1998. The tour will also conclude with a Labor Day weekend residency at the Gorge Amphitheatre for three back-to-back days of performances. Tickets are available for purchase from verified resale vendors such as StubHub and Vivid Seats. Original tickets for the 2025 performances are selling quickly, with several locations already selling out their original tickets. Ticket prices vary depending on the date, location, and demand for each show.
shortSummary: Dave Matthews Band's 2025 tour stops include four stops in Richmond, Virginia, and George, Washington, with limited original tickets available, but resale options are available on various resale sites.
argos_summary: The Dave Matthews Band is set to continue their tour into 2025, with highlights including a return to Richmond, Virginia, after 30 years and a three-day performance at the Gorge Amphitheatre over Labor Day weekend. Tickets for the tour are available through Ticketmaster, with original tickets selling quickly and resale options on platforms like StubHub and Vivid Seats offering more availability and varied pricing. Ticket prices range significantly based on location and demand, with general admission averaging around $66 and seating options from $100 to $700.
